summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4401 for the improvement of the alley in Block 8, Randell's Addition, being the alley between 36th Avenue and 37th Avenue, from East Union Street to East Spring Street, paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52054, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
